titleStmt.title: Toland's Invitation to Dismall to Dine

publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: Imitated from Horace Epist 5 lib 1
If Dearest Dismall youoverthou for once can dine
Upon a single Dish & tavern Wine
Toland to you this Invitation sends
To eat the Calves Head with your t overdrusty friends
Suspend awhile your vain Ambiti overhous hopes
Leave hunting after bribes forgett your tropes
To morrow we our Mystick Feast prepare
Where th overYou our latest proselite shall share
When we by proper signs & Symbolls tell
How by Brave Hands the Royall Traitor fell
The Meat shall represent the Tyrants head
The wine his Blood our Predecessou overars shed
Whilst an alluding hymn some artist sings
We toast Confusion to the Race of Kings
Att monarchy we nobly shew our spight
And Talk what Fools call treason all the night
Who by disgraces or ill fortune sunk
Feels not his soul Enliven'd when he's drunk
Wine can clear up Godolphins cloudy face
And fill Jack Smith with hopes to keep his place
By force of wine e'v'n Scarbor──w is brave
Hall──·──grows more pert & Somm──rs not so grave
Wine can give Portland witt & Cleavl──nd sense
Montag──e learning Bolt──n Eloquence
Cholmly over── when drunk can never loose his wand
And Linc──ln then Imagines he hath Land
My province is to See that all be right
Glasses & linnen Clean & pewter bright
From our misterious club to keep out spies
And Tories (drehole like waiters) in disguise
You shall be coupled as you best approve
Seated att Table next the men you love
Sundel──nd Orf──rd Bo──le & Richm──nds Grace
Will come, & Hampd──n shall have Walp──les place
Whart──n (unless prevented by a whore)
Will Hardly faill, & there is room for more
but I love Elbow room when ere I drink
And Honest Harry is too apt to stink
Let no pretence of business make you stay
Yet take one word of Counsell by the way
If Guernsey calls, send word you're gone abroad
He'll teaze you with King Charles & Bishop Laud
Or Make you fast, & carry you to prayers
But if he will break in & walk up stairs
Steal by the Back door out & leave him there
Then order Squash to call a hackney chair
